name: Peter's Pasta al' Tonno
author: Peter
summary: This is a classic, easy Italian dish which takes moments to prepare. Once you have tried it, your tuna casserole will never look the same!
directions: In a large pot cook spaghetti pasta with a teaspoon of oil in boiling salted water until al dente
Meanwhile, in a large skillet over medium heat saute the onions and garlic in  2 tablespoons of olive oil until soft and tender, about 3 or 4 minutes
Add the two cans of tuna and let cook on medium for 6 minutes
Add salt and pepper to taste, cooked pasta, and continue stirring
Turn burner to high heat, add remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil and cook for 3 or 4 minutes
Place the pasta in  large serving bowl and toss with the fresh parsley and grated Parmesan cheese
